figure_1.title: Figure 1.
figure_1.caption: Face of 64-year-old patient who presented to the neurology department with abrupt onset left hemifacial weakness. Her face was asymmetrical during smiling, and she had numbness around the left nasolabial fold.

claims.sentence: On exam, her left hemifacial expression ability was impaired so that her face seemed asymmetrical during smiling, and numbness around the left nasolabial fold was detected [Figure 1].
